name: SMASHED (Huw Weaver)
description:
Fight imaginary monsters while under the influence of alcohol - earn coins by defeating the beings, buy more drinks, unlock and upgrade weapons, and fight back the hoard!

---

---

SMASHED is a game created by five Staffordshire Uni students for a masters collaborative module in 2021.

The Team:
Alessandra Garber - Design/Tech
Huw Weaver - Tech
Ethan Holmes - Environment/UI design
Igraine Caldow - Character Artist
James Conway - Hard Surface/Prop artist
